scripts.build:all: pnpm -r --filter "./packages/vercel" build && pnpm -r --filter "./packages/vike-integration" build && pnpm -r --filter "./examples/*" build
scripts.test: pnpm run build:all && pnpm run -r test
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run test && pnpm changeset version
scripts.publish:beta: pnpm run prepublishOnly && pnpm changeset publish -r --tag beta
scripts.publish:stable: pnpm run prepublishOnly && pnpm changeset publish -r
